content: 6 -begin with medium blue 1 work 5 single_crochet in a magic_ring 5 2 3 single_crochet around 5 -f/o leave long tail for sewing antennae x 2 -begin with medium blue 1 chain 5 skip 1st chain slip_stitch across 4 -f/o leave long tail for sewing eyes x 2 -begin with black 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 -break off black and attach white 2 blo- slip_stitch around 6 -f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2025 icrochetthings 5/5 assembly sew the legs onto the bottom of the body where the body lines begin and end sew the eyes on either side of the front of the body sew the antennae onto the front of the body copyright © 2025 icrochetthings
